scripts.dev: yarn build-dev && npm-run-all --parallel watch-other watch-js watch-scss watch-i18n server
scripts.build: yarn create-dist && yarn build-i18n && yarn build-index-css && yarn build-js
scripts.build-dev: yarn copy-html && yarn build-i18n && yarn build-all-css-dev && yarn build-js-dev
scripts.build-vendor-css: node-sass src/styles/vendor.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers="ie >= 11, Safari >= 7.1, last 2 versions" > dist/vendor.css
scripts.build-vendor-css-dev: node-sass src/styles/vendor.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers="ie >= 11, Safari >= 7.1, last 2 versions" > dev/vendor.css
scripts.build-index-css: node-sass src/styles/index.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers="ie >= 11, Safari >= 7.1, last 2 versions" > dist/index.css
scripts.build-index-css-dev: node-sass src/styles/index.scss --output-style compressed | postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers="ie >= 11, Safari >= 7.1, last 2 versions" > dev/index.css
